listing.listing_description:
Casa Tepui is an enchanting private home at Tulum, situated within a gated community just one kilometer from Aldea Zama. With the ambiance of a jungle sanctuary, the villa blends contemporary architectural principles, high-end comforts, and the timeless, naturalistic minimalism of the Maya Riviera. Superb features include a private swimming pool, rooftop hot tub, gourmet kitchen, and four beautiful bedrooms with king or queen beds. The community also features a shared pool, clubhouse, paddle-tennis court, and 24-hour security, while various in-villa services are available.

The villa's unique design by Tulum based Co-Lab Design delivers a graceful, seamless fusion of interior and outdoor living, with ample terraces and airy rooms that seem to hover amid the lush foliage. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and relax in hammocks strung within the wooden veranda. Kindle the barbecue grill in the afternoon, and relish a wonderful meal of local fruits, vegetables, and seafood. Sip juice or cocktails in the evening light, and crawl into the hot tub for a moonlit soak.

Pocket doors open from the pool to the living room and kitchen, infusing the interior with an alfresco ambiance. The open-concept space includes a beautiful dining table, comfortable lounge, and fully equipped kitchen with generous prep areas and chef-quality appliances. Luminous white surfaces complement natural wood accents, harmonizing with the lush green surroundings. Air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary.

There are two suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms; one suite with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom; and a fourth room with a queen bed. All of the rooms include air conditioning, ceiling fans, and safes, and all enjoy dreamy jungle views. The arrangements are perfect for a family reunions, corporate retreat, or destination wedding guests.

Casa Tepui is within walking distance of the shops and restaurants at Aldea Zama, and just over three kilometers from the main nightlife district of Tulum. Paradise Beach and the area's famous Mayan ruins are just over five kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience modern Mexico at Villa Amalfi. This sleek, stylish vacation rental is set in the new Aldea Zama neighborhood, a pedestrian-friendly area of Tulum that’s between the beach and the charming town center. High-tech amenities, chic interiors and five bedrooms are perfect for a sunny getaway with friends or a tropical holiday with extended family.

With its quiet courtyard, private pool, shaded hammocks and al-fresco dining area, the villa feels like your own hideaway in the jungle. Stop by the markets in town for fresh seafood to try out on the barbecue and end the day with cocktails on the palapa-covered rooftop terrace. After dark, a satellite TV and Wi-Fi are ready to entertain.

The indoor and outdoor living areas at Villa Amalfi feel like one large space, thanks to a nearly wall-to-wall glass sliding door that connects the great room to the courtyard. Colorful and comfortable, the living room and fully equipped kitchen feature a mix of furnishings, lively turquoise hues and even traditional tilework for an ambience of laid-back luxury.

There are three bedrooms in the main house: two with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one with a queen bed and en-suite, and one with two twin beds and a shared half-bathroom. A separate living area with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and mini-fridge could be used as a honeymoon-style retreat within the property.

More than just a beach destination, the Riviera Maya has plenty to see and do. And Villa Amalfi is at the heart of it all, only a short drive from the Tulum beach and the must-see Tulum ruins. Take a day trip to enjoy the natural scenery of Cenote Chaak Tun or to sample the vibrant atmosphere and famed nightlife in Playa del Carmen.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find contemporary luxury just steps from one of the best surf breaks in Costa Rica at Villa Metisse. Set in a gated community between Playa Tamarindo and Playa Langosta, this beautiful modern vacation rental offers private beach access, plus a location close to a lively beach town and pristine national parks. Its bright, open interiors and four bedrooms can accommodate a group of friends or family for an unforgettable tropical holiday—or they can be reserved for a honeymoon away from it all.

The villa is laid out around a courtyard with a swimming pool, a deck lined with sun loungers and a barbecue. Spend lazy days at the beach or enjoying the sun in your own backyard, then pour a glass from the wine cooler to sip as you browse via Wi-Fi in the evenings. There are laundry facilities, so you’ll start each new adventure with fresh gear, and a baby bed is available if you’re traveling with a little one.

A wall of slide-away glass separates the deck from the villa’s open-concept great room. Stretch out on the chic yet inviting leather sectional, gather everyone around the dining table in fashionably mismatched chairs that seat ten or perch at the sleek breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Villa Metisse has two master bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with two bunk beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and the king and queen bedrooms have views of the pool and garden.

The property is within walking distance of Playa Tamarindo, known as both a surfing mecca and for the lively town filled with shops and eateries on its shores. It’s also within driving distance of several other beaches and beach towns, in case you’d like to do some exploring up and down the coast. Or make the short drive to Marino Las Baulas National Park and see the sandy stretch where thousands of leatherback sea turtles hatch every year.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on the hillside of Alta Vista, this luxurious six bedroom retreat has an absolutely dynamic view. With a pinch of the city, a dash of the bay, and a generous helping of the ocean, Villa Lucia captures unique vantage points of beautiful Puerto Vallarta. This area is well-known for its adventure tourism, sandy beaches, and vibrant city nightlife, making it ideal for an exciting family getaway.

Merging indoor and outdoor space is a key element of Lucia’s serene environment. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight flows easily throughout the interior spaces thanks to wide opening on the terrace. The interior decor is bright and cheerful, with plenty of natural wood and colourful local art. The fully equipped kitchen features plenty of functional workspace on its granite countertops and centre island. At dinner, the formal dining area has space for eight guests. If you’re feeling a little more casual, there’s a barbecue on the terrace and lots of space to dine alfresco.

Spend your afternoon relaxing in the balmy tropical weather from Lucia’s private terraces. Take a refreshing dip in the cliffside infinity pool. Enjoy the outdoor living spaces, lounge chairs, and ocean view. Back inside, enjoy perks like satellite television, a sound system, Wi-Fi, filtered water, and an exercise room.

Lucia features two master bedrooms with king sized beds. There are two more bedrooms in the main house with a pair of queen beds and two bedrooms in a separate casita with king size beds. Each bedroom has an en-suite and an incredible ocean view.

Fifteen minutes away, walking, you’ll find Puerto Vallarta’s most vibrant beach, Los Muertos. A popular spot among tourists and locals, this sandy stretch is known for its crystal clear waters and vibrant atmosphere. A little further and you’ll be in downtown Puerto Vallarta. If there’s a golfer in the group, Marina Vallarta Golf Club is beautifully scenic course, perfect for an afternoon trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Even if you don’t have much of a sweet tooth, you’ll find yourself craving a stay at Beach Kandi. Set on the sugary sands of Grace Bay Beach, the two-bedroom villa is close to perfect snorkeling reefs, the dining and sightseeing of Turtle Cove Marina and golf and tennis. Its breezy interiors and panoramic ocean views make it a treat indeed.

The villa opens to a spacious terrace with an inviting sitting area, lounge chairs and an infinity pool. You’re close enough to the beach that the villa’s pair of daybeds are right on the sand. After a day of snorkeling or sunbathing, rinse off in the outdoor shower and try cooking local seafood on the barbecue. In the evenings, switch on the sound system or share updates via Wi-Fi and sleep comfortably in the air conditioning.

A fold-away glass wall turns the open-plan great room of Beach Kandi into a breezy indoor-outdoor living space. Recline on the sitting area’s gray sofas, set a drink on the live-edge wood coffee table and watch the waves outside or the pop-up television. The wood textures are echoed by the dining table and chairs, which have room for six, as well as the polished wood ceiling. The bright, fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and sleek European cabinets.

The villa’s two bedrooms are set one above the other at the front of the house for spectacular water views. Each has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub and walk-in closet; the upstairs bedroom has a private balcony while the downstairs suite opens to the pool terrace. The bedrooms are modern and stylish, with wood ceilings, white walls and creamy marble floors, but the showstopper in each is the ceiling-mounted tub filler.

Plan to fly into Providenciales International Airport, just under 4 miles (or about a 10-minute drive) from the villa. Once you’re at Beach Kandi, you may not need to put your shoes on for the rest of your stay, thanks to its location right on Grace Bay Beach. But if you’d like to see more of the island, it’s a 10-minute walk to Turtle Cove Marina, 4 miles to the reefs at Princess Alexandra National Park and 7 miles to historic Cheshire Hall. Work on your swing at Turks & Caicos Islands Tennis Club, 2 miles away, or a different kind of swing at at Provo Golf Club, 6 miles away.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, contact a Villa Specialist. 

Tap into the magical energy of Tulum at Casa Adama. This contemporary Riviera Maya vacation rental draws inspiration from art and healing traditions from around the world, and uses sleek modern architecture to create both wonderfully open spaces and private hideaways. Even better, its location in the coveted Aldea Zama area is close to the beach, the ruins, and shopping and dining in town.

Listen to the breeze move through the jungle from a ground-level terrace with loungers and a pool, or soak in the sun from a rooftop terrace with its own plunge pool. There’s also a gas barbecue, as well as high-tech amenities from a smart TV to Wi-Fi.

The heart of this dramatic home is a living room with 25-foot-high ceilings, a glass wall opening to the pool area, and a collection of Balinese and Moroccan art and furnishings—think leather poufs and hand-woven rugs. It flows into another open-concept space with a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area around a gorgeous onyx table and a second sitting area.

This luxury property has four bedrooms with king beds: three with en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite that occupies 1,000 square feet on the villa’s third floor, and one with access to a hall bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two queen beds and an en-suite bathroom. The five bedrooms can accommodate up to twelve friends or family members on holiday together.

Casa Adama’s location in Aldea Zama, an exclusive residential area, gives you easy access to both shops and cafés in the center of Tulum, and restaurants and beach bars along the road to the beach. Of course, it wouldn’t be a visit to Tulum without seeing the oceanfront ruins, also just a short drive away from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Novelist James Michener called Marigot Bay, “the most beautiful bay in the Caribbean.” Stepping out onto the terrace of Villa Ashiana, you’ll see why. The home is a tribute to classic colonial design with hints of old-world charm. Terraces, patios and decks allow you to take in the stunning bay view, where yachts and sailboats stream to and fro across turquoise waters.

Spend your days on the sun-drenched pool terrace. Relax in a chaise longue and when the sun gets too hot, open a canvas parasol or take a dip in the large pool. Settle into one of the lounge sets on the ground floor patio, amid elegant columns. When dusk approaches, gather your guests with a cocktail and watch the sun set across the horizon. An outdoor barbecue allows you to grill up fresh local seafood which you can serve at the al fresco table.

Inside, soft living room sofas and chairs will lure you in, providing maximum comfort while you enjoy a movie on the flatscreen television. The ground floor’s two living rooms, dining room and kitchen are laid out in an open concept plan, divided into sections by more columns and lush potted tropical plants. The chef-appointed kitchen will inspire you to create memorable feasts and a cook is also available to prepare meals. Savor every bite around a beautiful glass dining table.

All five bedrooms are on the upper floor and each is individually decorate with tasteful linens and furnishings: four-poster bed, rattan chairs and floral patterns to name a few. The first three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms while the remaining two share facilities. Air conditioning cools each room and an open-air patio wraps the floor.

Sailing is the lifeblood of Marigot Bay and you’ll have no trouble chartering a boat for an excursion to the famous Pitons or simply renting a sailboat to whip around the bay. When you’re back on land, you’ll find several good dining options in town. Shoppers will enjoy a day trip to Castries and the duty free Pointe Seraphine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a breezy, balmy island paradise at Villa Rosa. From its secluded hillside location, this luxury Jamaica vacation rental commands views of the lush tropical forest all the way to the sea near Half Moon Beach. Its chic, relaxed interiors and four bedrooms are fully staffed by a chef, butler and housekeeper who are ready to make your holiday a memorable one.

The villa’s wooden gates swing open to reveal a palm-lined allée leading toward the house, terrace and the ocean beyond. Comfortable sitting areas and an al-fresco dining area and barbecue beckon on the terrace just outside the house, and steps lead down to a sunny deck with lounge chairs around the heated pool. Active guests will appreciate the private exercise room with a deck for yoga; those who just want to relax will appreciate the outdoor hot tub and indoor spa and bar. In addition to the chef, butler and housekeeping services, your stay at Villa Rosa also includes membership at the elegant, exclusive Half Moon Club.

The classic Caribbean aesthetic of high-contrast white and dark wood gets a modern update at Villa Rosa, where whitewashed ceilings with exposed wooden beams are the backdrop to sleek, airy spaces that open to the outdoor living areas. Enjoy the ocean breeze from one of the sitting areas closest to the terrace, or get cozier in the chevron-patterned armchairs around the television. A formal dining area can seat up to eleven, and there’s space for more casual meals at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Rosa has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; two have al-fresco showers and terraces, and two have al-fresco bathtubs and balconies. If you’re traveling as a family, especially with older children, you can convert the sofa in the media room to three twin beds. Vaulted ceilings and ample windows give the bedrooms the same bright, sunny feel as the rest of the house, and spa-like bathrooms invite you to linger.

A stay at this villa puts you just a few minutes from the amenities of the Half Moon Club, from the golf course to the clear, calm waters of Half Moon Beach. If you’d like to see more of the island, join the couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner in Montego Bay, meet local fauna at Rockland’s Bird Sanctuary, follow the flow at Mayfield Falls or sample the goods on offer at Appleton Sugar and Rum Factory.

For animal lovers, a few friendly dogs live on the grounds but will not venture into the home or pool area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay between beach and town in Tulum at the beautifully designed Casa Lulu. This Riviera Maya vacation rental is tucked away in the exclusive Aldea Zama residential neighborhood, a quiet enclave just a short drive from shopping and dining in town and the idyllic stretch of the beach. Reserve its four bedrooms for a getaway with up to eight friends or a relaxed holiday with the extended family.

The casa is nestled into a private courtyard with a sunny terrace featuring a pool, loungers and a barbecue. Spend days lazing by the pool or exploring the area, then come inside at night for a glass from the wine fridge and a quiet evening in front of the TV or Wi-Fi. For your comfort, the house has both ceiling fans and air conditioning.

Inside, Casa Lulu embodies laid-back luxury. A slide-away glass wall separates the terrace from the open-concept great room, where you can stretch out on the sofa in front of the TV, gather around the dining table or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. Colorful accents, wicker furniture and a stunning waterfall countertop add to the vibe of chilled-out cool.

The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared hall bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a Jack-and-Jill-style bathroom that’s accessible from both rooms.

More than just a beach destination, Tulum is also a hot spot of culture and history. (Of course, Casa Lulu is also just a short drive from a postcard-perfect beach, too.) Head into town to browse artisan wares, sip drinks at a bar or cafe, or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy meal. Don’t miss the chance to visit the area’s incredible oceanfront ruins for a glimpse into Mayan history.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Impeccable Brushstrokes is part of the magical Belizean Cove Estates, an exquisite beachfront oasis of tranquility with spectacular views of the Ambergris Caye and the remarkable Caribbean Sea.

Brushstrokes villa is named to reflect the owners' love and appreciation for the art and people of Belize. Once inside this splendid villa you’ll be delighted by its light and airy cream décor that acts as the perfect backdrop to the many paintings and sculptures by local Belizean artists. Furnished tastefully with a mix of comfortable imported and locally designed furniture it also features fabulous Belizean Mahogany and other indigenous hardwoods that make you feel enveloped by local culture. Your immaculate kitchen is spacious and well equipped and has an adjoining dining area that easily accommodates up to eight people. Your relaxed living room features an entertainment system with a 42 inch high definition telephone and a surround sound system; all the comforts of home with the Caribbean just steps away.

Outside your luxurious marble-decked veranda is the perfect place for you to savor a spectacular beachfront sunrise while you have breakfast of fresh local produce. Afterwards you might want to take a dip in the delightful shared pool or unwind in the hot tub. Why not head down to the beach later and take out a sea kayak? It’s going to be another superb day and this is the ideal way to explore the Caye.

Your three bedroom villa features luxurious and uniquely decorated private guest bedrooms. The master bedroom, with king bed and lavish bathroom with shower and whirlpool tub, has another magnificent ocean view. The second bedroom, with queen bed, is decorated in whimsical island colors and a lovely third bedroom, with two twin beds, features a Mayan theme in its décor. Each bedroom has a door to the outside, copious windows and a full bathroom in luxurious Mexican Macedonia marble.

San Pedro Town, the only town on the island, is just 3 miles away you are one mile from tennis and basketball courts. Belize’s famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25 mile length of the island.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Searching for a vacation with something for everyone? Casita 8 has you covered. Spend your mornings on the golf course, and your afternoons at the spa while the kids have a blast exploring the 10-acre Crystal Lagoon Pool. Later, dine at one of the resort restaurants or drive a few minutes into the bustling city of Cabo San Lucas to dance the night away. If you’re feeling low-key, San Jose del Cabo has a much more relaxed vibe, art galleries, and boutique shops. 

The soothing pastels, rich granite, and natural stonework of Spanish colonial revivalist architecture set a playful, relaxing tone in this Mexican 3-bedroom. Casita 8’s airy layout is easy to appreciate, especially when the warm afternoon sun and fresh sea breeze wash over you while reading in the living room. It may inspire you to move outside, where a hot tub, fire pit, and multi-level terrace provide plenty of opportunities to break away from the group with that special someone. 

When it’s time for some family fun, Diamante’s 1.5 miles of white sand beach and the 10-acre lagoon pool are great spots to spend the afternoon. The Kids Paradise Program makes it easy to sneak away for a round of golf. Tiger Woods has designed 2 courses on the Diamante estate and the Dunes Course is another favorite among PGA pros, all are within a 7-minute drive. And, the spa, wellness center, and gym make it easy to keep up with any health routines. 

While you’re in the Cabo’s, you’ll definitely want to check out El Arco, the natural rock formation that graces almost every postcard. After you’ve taken a picture or two, hit the surf at Divorce Beach or soak up the nightlife on the popular shores of Medano Beach. Before you head home, pick up something to remind you of your time in Cabo at the Puerto Paraiso Shopping Center. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sway back and forth in a hammock as the sun sets at this beachfront villa in Costa Rica. Follow the lawn past the hay-thatched palapa onto your own slice of Santa Teresa Beach, where magnificent ocean views await. Or, hang back and splash around in the villa’s infinity pool. Later, walk 3-minutes into town for dinner and shopping, or drive 5-minutes to find vibrant nightlife.

Casa Milya lets nature shine in its airy, open-concept interior. Showing off relaxing wood tones, pastels, and bright textiles, this beach house is the perfect complement to the gorgeous setting outside. Through ocean-framing doors, you’ll flow freely to the alfresco setting, where a rustic, yet trendy picnic table sets the perfect tone for backyard barbecues. Tall palm trees create shady spots for reading, while sunbeds are ready to help you work on your vacation tan in other areas of the terrace. Back inside, pull up a stool at the kitchen bar, mix a few tropical cocktails, and soak up the breezy vibes.

Santa Teresa has excellent surfing conditions for all experience levels. If you’re a seasoned vet, Playa Santa Teresa is known for its fast, powerful breaks. If you’re a first-timer, take a lesson on Playa Hermosa, where you’ll find gentler, smaller waves to help ease you in. After, cool down with a cocktail at one of the beachfront bars on Santa Teresa’s coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Thoughtfully designed to protect its guest's privacy, this luxury villa enjoys instant beachfront access to Jamaica’s finest, James Bond Beach. Without interrupting the endless ocean view, Roaring Pavilion manages to use dense tropical greenery and a secured perimeter to create a secluded oasis for its ten guests. Inside, you’ll fall in love with Roaring Pavilion’s four themed master-bedrooms, and children’s bunk. The house features a full staff, spacious indoor/outdoor lounge areas, and an extensive list of amenities. Roaring Pavilion is the perfect setting for a special event and has hosted countless A-listers over its many years perched atop the list of Jamaica’s most sought-after luxury vacation rentals.

The intricacy and grace of colonial architecture is the perfect contrast to Jamaica’s incredible natural environment. Wide archways to the terrace invite fresh ocean breeze, natural sunlight, and amazing views of the Caribbean Sea to exist ubiquitously throughout every inch of Roaring Pavilion’s elegant interior. Decorated with stately chandelier lighting, designer furniture, the highest-end electronics, and eclectic works of art, Roaring Pavilion is more than ready to host your next unforgettable Luxury Retreats vacation.

Social spaces like the games room, exercise room, library, barbecue pit, swimming pool, and beachfront ensure that you and your guests will always have somewhere exciting to gather. For more intimate moments, the anti-aging spa, wellness center, and numerous smaller seating areas provide the seclusion you desire. Inside, Roaring Pavilion is equipped with state of the art electronics, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. Outside, you’ll love the ocean view from the alfresco dining area. On the beach, you’ll have access to kayaks, paddle boards, and one Wave-Runner per suite.

If you decide to venture beyond Roaring Pavilion’s gates, you’ll find shopping and golf just a few minutes from home. If you feel like exploring some of Jamaica’s natural wonders, Green Grotto Caves, Dunn’s River Falls, and Dolphin Cove are perfect for an afternoon excursion, and they’re within twenty-minutes of home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Roaring Pavilion boasts a full-time staff. At guests' beck and call, the staff provides every service imaginable, from individual culinary requests to the meticulous attentions of a butler, to complimentary, professionally managed laundry. Of particular note is chef Johanna Mitchell, whose culinary delights include intricate continental dishes and dazzling local specialties with the freshest market ingredients. Twenty-four hour room service is also available at this one of a kind retreat. All service is provided seamlessly and discreetly, with guests only charged for their actual consumption of food and beverages, and use of chauffeured ground service, at local prices. They are not bound to any set plan or menu, but can enjoy themselves as their preferences and lifestyle dictate.

listing.listing_address: Roaring River, St Ann's Bay, Saint Ann, Jamaica

listing.listing_description:
Olympus is a luminous contemporary gem situated on a beachfront estate near Rum Point on the north shore Grand Cayman. Masterfully designed to optimize its seaside setting and panoramic ocean views, the 3,000-square-foot home features ample alfresco living areas including a pool deck and superb rooftop terrace, along with spacious, stylish interiors illuminated by expansive glass walls. Four ocean-view bedrooms accommodating twelve guests include a family suite and a stunning master suite with private terrace. Your vacation rental includes on-island benefits provided by Silver Thatch, including reservation services, a variety of discounts, and access to fitness and business centers.

Pristine white sands extend from the villa's pool terrace to the verge of the crystalline Caribbean, inviting you to plunge into the dreamy water and survey the vast horizon. Tile patios and lounge chairs frame the wrap-around pool, while the ipe wood deck hosts a chic lounge for afternoon refreshments in the shade. The rooftop features the villa's pièce de résistance: a voluminous terrace with sheltered dining table, kitchen, open-air lounge, and 360-degree views of the island and sea.

A 40-foot, floor-to-ceiling glass door opens from the pool deck to the villa's interior, imbibing the ocean's light and breeze. The ample salon includes a large flat-screen TV, while the open, chef-appointed kitchen boasts a marble-topped island beside a beautiful wood dining table. Pure white walls and sleek lines accentuate the island light and hues of sunset, while natural wood furnishing and accents infuse a rustic note into the ethereal ambiance. The media room is perfect for afternoon downtime or cozy nights, and there is a furnished home office for business travelers.

The bedroom suites at Olympus offer exquisite private havens for couples, individuals, and families, featuring ensuite bathrooms, high-end entertainment systems, air conditioning, and breathtaking ocean views. The exceptional North King Suite opens to a well-appointed terrace and features a bold glass wall to maximize its privileged ocean vistas. The family suite includes a queen bed, sofa bed, and kitchenette.

The prime location of Olympus balances seaside seclusion and convenient proximity to some of the finest clubs, beaches, and nightlife spots on Grand Cayman, with Rum Point Club, Kaibo Yacht Club, and Starfish Point all within five to ten minutes of your door.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sun, sand and sea of the Riviera Maya are all at the doorstep of Hacienda Del Mar. Even better, this beachfront vacation rental has an attentive staff, luxury amenities and fifteen bedrooms for up to thirty-five guests, both in the main house and in two casitas. Reserve this beautifully appointed property for a family reunion, birthday or anniversary celebration, or a sun-kissed destination wedding for up to 250 guests along with the two additional sister haciendas.

Your stay at the hacienda includes the services of a gourmet chef for three meals each day, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as welcome refreshments and bottled drinking water. (If you’ll be staying over the winter holidays, even more is included.) The villa features its own heated pool, an outdoor sound system, and al-fresco living and dining areas facing the beach, plus a games room, bar, satellite television and Wi-Fi.

Sliding glass doors connect the villa’s open-concept great room to its beachfront outdoor living areas.

There are seven bedrooms in the villa’s main house and four bedrooms in each of its two casitas. In the main house, there are five bedrooms with king beds and two with two twin beds each. Both casitas have two bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All of the casita bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.

The oceanfront location of Hacienda Del Mar puts you right on Fatima Bay Beach, a 5-minute walk from the Puerto Aventuras Golf and Tennis Club, and a 10-minute drive from Xpu-Ha Beach and downtown Playa del Carmen. Be sure to leave time for a day trip to the ruins of Tulum, a 30-minute drive away, and Tulum itself, an increasingly popular honeymoon and getaway destination.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Read our insider guide to Hacienda Del Mar in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/05/vacation-diary-riviera-maya-mexico/)

listing.listing_description:
This canal-side luxury home, located in the prestigious Leeward Settlement of Turks and Caicos, offers its guests the opportunity to enjoy instant access to the beautiful turquoise waters of the Caribbean. Perfect for a golf getaway, fishing trip, or a watersports adventure, Turks and Caicos have an incredibly serene atmosphere, yet plenty of opportunities to get out and enjoy a wide range of attractions. Nearby, you’ll find Provo Golf Club, Grace Bay Beach, and Leeward’s Main Street, which is lined with shops, restaurants, and nightlife establishments.

Privacy is easy to find at White Coral, with its accommodations for twelve split between the four-bedroom Main House, and the two bedroom Guest House, all of which feature en-suite bathrooms. The open concept living area that runs alongside the terrace and canal is perfect for group gatherings. Decorated with elegant white marble, designer furniture, peaked ceilings, and plenty of openings to the terrace, the Great Room promotes a breezy, open-air atmosphere. Throughout the villa, you’ll find subtle splashes of color in the form of tropical greenery, bright textiles, and throw-pillows that add a touch of excitement to the classic white color scheme.

White Coral is outfitted with formal and alfresco dining areas, a fully equipped kitchen, and a barbecue. Outside, you’ll love lounging in sun beds, beach chairs, and in the refreshing swimming pool as you watch the boats go by the canal. Back inside, you’ll appreciate air conditioning, television, a sound system, Wi-fi, and a washer/dryer. And, included with your reservation, you’ll receive airport transfer and daily housekeeping.

When you’re ready to get out and do some exploring, you’ll find TCI Ferry and Caribbean Cruisin within a fifteen-minute walk. These services can connect you with other areas and islands in Turks and Caicos, as well as assist with your own charters, excursions, and jet ski rentals. Within a six-minute drive, you’ll be able to reach Grace Bay, Emerald, and Pelican beaches. And, if you’re really feeling adventurous, Turks and Caicos Kiteboarding are just five minutes from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
